title: Product of the Week: Kitchen Glass Splashback – Red & White Wine Design
description: Make a statement in your kitchen with this heat-resistant glass splashback featuring a vibrant red & white wine splash design!
author: Anzah
excerpt: Upgrade your kitchen with this heat-resistant, toughened glass splashback featuring a bold red & white wine splash design. It’s easy to clean, durable, and stylish!
text: Why settle for a plain kitchen when you can turn it into a statement space? This heat-resistant toughened glass splashback isn’t just functional—it’s a bold and artistic addition to your home. It has a dynamic red and white wine splash design. As such, it can add a modern and high-energy vibe to your cooking area, all while protecting your walls from spills and splatters. The dramatic wine splash print turns your backsplash into an eye-catching feature, perfect for wine lovers and modern kitchen designs. It is crafted from durable and heat-resistant tempered glass. So, this panel provides excellent protection behind stovetops and countertops. It’s built to withstand high temperatures and frequent use! Whether you have a sleek contemporary kitchen or a cozy wine-themed space, this splashback blends seamlessly with different decor styles. Additionally, it comes ready to install, making it a quick upgrade for your kitchen. No need for complex renovations—just place it behind your hob or sink and transform your space instantly. The smooth glass surface is easy to wipe clean, ensuring your kitchen stays pristine with minimal effort. So, it’s about time you say goodbye to stubborn stains! Available now on Etsy.
html:
Why settle for a plain kitchen when you can turn it into a statement space? This heat-resistant toughened glass splashback isn’t just functional—it’s a bold and artistic addition to your home. It has a dynamic red and white wine splash design. As such, it can add a modern and high-energy vibe to your cooking area, all while protecting your walls from spills and splatters.

The dramatic wine splash print turns your backsplash into an eye-catching feature, perfect for wine lovers and modern kitchen designs. It is crafted from durable and heat-resistant tempered glass. So, this panel provides excellent protection behind stovetops and countertops. It’s built to withstand high temperatures and frequent use!

Whether you have a sleek contemporary kitchen or a cozy wine-themed space, this splashback blends seamlessly with different decor styles. Additionally, it comes ready to install, making it a quick upgrade for your kitchen. No need for complex renovations—just place it behind your hob or sink and transform your space instantly.

The smooth glass surface is easy to wipe clean, ensuring your kitchen stays pristine with minimal effort. So, it’s about time you say goodbye to stubborn stains!


Available now on Etsy.
